Text: Tak o̩la Jihofa wʼugbo Jihiu, o̩ma Hananai, agwunyu Beasha, kakini,
Abu kʼu mʼe̩ du kwef ebutu, kʼu fʼuwe̩ hine, kʼu la dʼuwe chʼe̩nuto̩gba abo-mi Israe̩l, tak e̩ kwolule̩ lʼikpa Je̩ro̩bo̩am, kʼe̩ la je̩ ñw amone̩-mi Israe̩l dure, ku ma nʼadure-ma bi mi eju;
go, omi afu Beasha kpʼabo unyi-wñ gba rinyo̩ hioko; oñ nache kʼunyi-we̩ ki dab unyi Je̩ro̩boam o̩ma Nebat.
E̩ne̩ Beasha ki leku ef ewo, amabia amʼu du je̩; e̩ne̩ ki la leku oko, ame̩we̩ ojale amʼu du je̩.
O̩la Beasha ki bo̩ kpʼe̩wñ kʼi che kpʼugbiti-wñ, i che̩ko̩ rʼef o̩takada Iko E̩wñ Amonu Israe̩l le̩ n?
Oñ Beasha cholu manyʼamata-wñ, ma la mʼu du ji Tirza. Tak Ela, o̩ma-wñ jʼonu koji-wñ.

Amanyʼe-le̩ o̩la Jihofa lewa agwunyu Beasha kpʼabʼunyi-wñ lʼalu Jihiu akache̩, o̩ma Hananai le̩, tod e̩wñ bie̩ne̩ du kʼi che eju Jihofa, kʼi la nʼuko̩lo̩ kʼo̩wo̩-wñ che bi owñ eju, abu kʼowñ kpʼabo unyi Je̩ro̩boam chʼe̩re̩ʼka, kʼi laño̩ mʼowñ du kpa.
O̩do̩ ogu nyoke me̩fa kʼEsa jʼonu Juda, Ela o̩ma Beasha, chane̩ ejʼonu Israe̩l Tirza. I la je̩ o̩do̩ meji.
Oñ adu-wñ, Zimri, kʼi chʼagboji ukpe̩reji o̩ko̩ ogu-wñ dʼalu nyʼu. Oñ e̩gba kʼi de̩ Tirza añmʼo̩te̩ ki fʼu mu ef unyi Arza kʼi nʼo̩da unyi onu Tirza.
Zimri la mugudu nyʼejefu oñ i fʼe̩wñ nʼu, oñ i mʼu du kpa o̩do̩ Esa, onu Juda, ogu nyoke mebie. Tak i jʼonu koji-wñ.

Oñ i lewatu, e̩gba kʼi chane̩ onu-wñ eje̩, abu kʼi lewa gugu oj ede-wñ ababa, i mʼabo unyi Beasha ko kpa chaka. I tʼo̩ma e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ du no ñw u n, i chaka chʼe-efu-wñ pio̩o̩, i chaka chʼe-onuku-wñ ofo.
Abe̩le̩ Zimri fʼabo unyi Beasha du kpa rinyo̩ teju o̩la Jihofa kʼi ka agwunyu Beasha lʼalu Jihiu, akache̩ le̩,
tod adure Beasha du kpai adure Ela, o̩ma-wñ, owñ chʼe-kʼama onugo dure kpʼe-ku ma je̩ ñw Israe̩l dure, ku ma nʼe̩wñ ibe̩te̩-ma nyi Jihofa, O̩jo̩ Israe̩l uwe̩do̩.
Oñ o̩la Ela ki bo̩ kpʼe̩wñ du kʼi che, i che̩ko̩ rʼef o̩takada Iko E̩wñ Amonu Israe̩l le̩ n?
O̩do̩ ogu nyoke mebie kʼEsa jʼonu Juda, Zimri jʼonu o̩jo̩ mebie Tirza. Oñ amone̩ le̩ ru ru nyʼu Gibe̩to̩n, e-kʼabo Filistia ne̩ le̩.
Tak amone̩ ku ma ruru jo gbo̩ kakini, Zimri fʼalo da nyʼonu, tak i ño̩ mʼu du kpa, todule̩ abo Israe̩l chaka ku ma jʼuru le̩ mʼO̩mri kʼi chʼagboji abogu du jʼonu Israe̩l o̩jo̩ le̩.
Tak O̩mri kwo Gibe̩to̩n te̩gu alo, abo Israe̩l chaka la le bʼo̩, oñ ma kwokpala nyu Tirza.
Oñ i lewatu e̩gba ku Zimri li ka ku ma fʼewo le̩ du, i le tʼef unyi onu ejefu. Tak i fʼunyi onu gujo bʼo̩la-wñ oji ma, oñ i leku,
tod adure kʼi ta ugbo e̩wñ ki bie̩ne̩ eju Jihofa kʼi che, elule̩ kʼi lule̩ likpa Je̩ro̩boam, kpai ef adure kʼi che kʼi je̩ ñw abo Israe̩l dure ge̩.
Oñ o̩la Zimri ki bo̩ kpʼalu kʼi da nyʼonu, i che̩ko̩ rʼef o̩takada Iko E̩wñ Amonu Israe̩l le̩ n?
E̩gbale̩ abo Israe̩l chʼe̩dareji, ukpe̩reji amone̩ tu Tibni, o̩ma Ginat, ubi ku ma mʼu du jʼonu; ukpe̩reji-ma la tʼO̩mri ubi.
Amone̩ ku ma tʼO̩mri ubi muda fʼamone̩ ku ma tu Tibni, o̩ma Ginat, ubi du: abe̩le̩ Tibni leku, oñ O̩mri jʼonu le̩.
O̩do̩ ogue̩gwa nyokeʼka kʼEsa jʼonu Juda, O̩mri chane̩ ejʼonu Israe̩l. I je̩ o̩do̩ me̩gweji. O̩do̩ me̩fa oñ i je̩ Tirza.
Tak i nʼajifa alu tale̩nt meji la uwo Samaria o̩wo̩ Sheme̩r. Tak i fʼunyi ko̩ oj uwo le̩, oñ i dʼodu ewo kʼi ko le̩ ko̩ Samaria ki bi odu Sheme̩r e̩ne̩ kʼi nʼuwo le̩.
O̩mri ño̩ fʼe̩wñ ki bie̩ne̩ eju Jihofa che. I la fʼe̩wñ bibi che tʼabo du ku ma je̩ akwoubi le.
Todu i lule̩ likpa ki Je̩ro̩boam o̩ma Nebat le chaka, kpai ef adure-wñ du e-kʼi ne̩ je̩ ñw abo Israe̩l dure, kʼama ki nʼe̩wñ ibe̩te̩-ma nyi Jihofa, O̩jo̩ Israe̩l, uwe̩do̩.
Oñ o̩la O̩mri ki bo̩ kpʼe̩wñ kʼi che, kpai ugbiti-wñ kʼi du dufu, i che̩ko̩ rʼef o̩takada Iko E̩wñ Amonu Israe̩l le̩ n?
Abe̩le̩ O̩mri cholu manyʼamata-wñ, oñ ma mʼu du ji Samaria. Tak Ehab o̩ma-wñ jʼonu koji-wñ.
Oñ o̩do̩ ogue̩gwa nyoke me̩jo̩ kʼEsa jʼonu Juda, Ehab o̩ma O̩mri chane̩ ejʼonu Israe̩l, Ehab o̩ma O̩mri la jʼonu Israe̩l Samaria o̩do̩ ogu nyoke meji.
Ehab o̩ma O̩mri la fʼe̩wñ ki bie̩ne̩ eju Jihofa che tʼabo du ku ma je̩ akwoubi le.
Oñ i lewatu, dabe̩ne̩ kʼelule̩ ef adure Jeroboam o̩ma Nebat, chʼe̩wñ fuye̩ eju-wñ, i ño̩ fʼu Je̩zebel O̩ma E̩tbeal onu Saido̩n, ne̩ chʼo̩ya, tak i re̩ Beal, i laño̩ dojikane̩ ñw u.
Tak Ehab fʼubo̩ iche̩bo̩ kpa todu Beal ef unyi Beal e-kʼi ko̩ Samaria.
Oñ i fʼAshe̩ra che; Ehab ño̩ chʼe̩wñ tʼe-i le kʼi nyi Jihofa O̩jo̩ Israe̩l uwe̩do̩ tʼamonu Israe̩l du ku ma je̩ akwoubi le.

O̩kpanachi e-wñ oñ Hie̩l, e̩ne̩ Be̩te̩l, fu Je̩riko ko̩. E̩re̩-wñ kʼi du nyane̩ oñ Abaram o̩mo̩gba-wñ e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ lenyo̩; alaku-wñ kʼi la du dago, Segub, o̩ma-wñ e̩ne̩ke̩le̩ e-kekele lenyo̩; teju o̩la ku Jihofa ka lʼalu Jo̩shua, o̩ma Nun.
